tool.name: SAGA.garden_fractals.3
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayINPUT False output_data_RESULT $output_data_RESULT name SAGA.garden_fractals.3 INPUT $INPUT DSIZE $DSIZE prefer $prefer response $response outputType_RESULT $OutputSection_RESULT.outputType_RESULT transmissionMode_RESULT $OutputSection_RESULT.transmissionMode_RESULT

param.name: INPUT
param.label: Input
param.help: Input The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi, tiff, png

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_RESULT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_RESULT
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Calculates surface areas for increasing mesh sizes.
